name: Connected Off-Channel Features at Q2 (#/km)
functionStatement: Multiple off-channel features provide storage and low-velocity habitat when floodplain activates.
descriptionMarkdown: Count of off-channel storage features connected at ~Q2 per km of main channel. Higher is better.
howToMeasureMarkdown: Map features; determine if connected at Q2/bankfull; count connected features per km.

sourceMetadata.metricStatement: Multiple off-channel features provide storage and low-velocity habitat when floodplain activates.
sourceMetadata.description: Count of off-channel storage features connected at ~Q2 per km of main channel. Higher is better.
sourceMetadata.howToMeasure: Map features; determine if connected at Q2/bankfull; count connected features per km.
referencesRaw: SFARI rapid assessment; LiDAR/imagery interpretation; field verification.

stratifications.name: Proposed (derived from SFARI rapid curves) - Use O/E for confined valleys where expected density is low.
